extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Mastodon Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the Mastodon instance is running a version between 3.5.0 and 3.5.8, 4.0.4, or 4.1.2.

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Mastodon to Patched Version
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade the Mastodon instance to the latest patched version: 4.1.3, 4.0.5, or 3.5.9, depending on the current major version.
